name: The Room of Reflection
description:
Firefox Browser Recommended

_____________

Welcome to The Room of Possibilities, a game where you're confined to a singleroom.

Explore the limits of your imagination as you encounter multiple possibilities and outcomes that will challenge your expectations.

If you're a fan of games like Stanley's Parable, this is the perfect game for you.

Features:

  • Multiple endings depending on your choices
  • A thought-provoking storyline

Controls:
W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys : Move
Left Mouse Button : Interact

Developers:

Lucas Zilke : Game Design / Programming / Art

robswordmusic : Music
